casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Steward Pernell HUNTLEY. No. 294P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of June 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for a Review": "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005." Justice MARTIN recused.
